remarks: Indexed intersection with an unordered pair index.  (Contributed by NM, 25-Jan-2012.)
statement:
iinxprg.1 $e |- ( x = A -> C = D ) $.
iinxprg.2 $e |- ( x = B -> C = E ) $.
iinxprg $p |- ( ( A e. V /\ B e. W ) -> |^|_ x e. { A , B } C = ( D i^i E ) ) $.
$d A x $.
$d B x $.
$d D x $.
$d E x $.
